title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5309.2 - Termination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5309.2 - Termination

State Regulations

Upon the termination of a lobbyist's retainer, employment
or designation, such lobbyist and the client on whose behalf such service has
been rendered shall give written notice to the commission within 30 days after
the lobbyist ceases the activity that required such lobbyist to file a lobbying
registration form. Such lobbyist shall nevertheless comply with reporting
requirements up to the date such activity has ceased, as required by Article
1-A of the Legislative Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5309.2

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
